infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: MoveTogether uses your calendar to schedule workout reminders and competition events.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: MoveTogether can access contacts to invite friends to competitions.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: MoveTogether uses the camera to take profile photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: MoveTogether needs access to your photos to upload profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: MoveTogether needs access to your health data to track your activity rings, workouts, weight, and fitness progress for competitions.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: MoveTogether needs permission to save your workout data and fitness metrics to Apple Health.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: MoveTogether uses your location to track outdoor workouts.

plugins.calendarPermission: MoveTogether uses your calendar to schedule workout reminders and competition events.
plugins.remindersPermission: MoveTogether uses your reminders to schedule workout reminders and competition events.
